issue.title: [C++][Compute]: Optimize small integer sorting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7526](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7526). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current sorting kernel handles all data types with stl stable_sort. It is suboptimal for small integers like Int8, in which case counting sort is more suitable.
